change.changenote: Section 4 (2) BEFORE amended by 2012-12-114, effective May 14, 2012 (Royal Assent).

subsection.subsectiontext: The accounts of a board must be audited by a person appointed by the Lieutenant Governor in Council.

change.changenote: Section 5 BEFORE repealed by 2003-22-8, effective April 10, 2003 (Royal Assent).

section.marginalnote: Purchasing Commission Act does not apply
section.sectiontext: The Purchasing Commission Act does not apply to this Act.
